item.description:
Please see the details below for our member Matt Norris
___________________________________________________

Hi Kevin,

This is Matt Norris. I attended one of your events about a year ago, at an Indian restaurant in Federal Hill. I wanted to let you know about a great event taking place June 10th in Mendon, MA. I know...not RI, but it's only about a 25 minute drive from downtown Providence.

Maple Farm Sanctuary is an animal sanctuary providing lifelong homes for abused, abandoned and unwanted farmed animals while promoting veganism and respect for all life. I volunteer there. I love it!

Our annual fundraiser - Farm Fest - is a fun way to help this non-profit survive. And they need all of the help they can get. Vegans/Vegetarians (and others) from all over MA and RI attend.

I was hoping you would post it to your meetup group. I can provide more information if you'd like. Or you can visit our website: www.maplefarmsanctuary.org

Thanks,

Matt

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Maple Farm Sanctuary - Farm Fest 2012
